name: card.01
title: Intelligent Rodents
rules1: You may discard a card before ranting.
rules2: When your opponent plays a wild role, you may rant.

name: card.02
title: Brain in a Jar
rules1: You may use any material when adding to a metal gadget.
rules2: Your completed metal gadgets are worth +1 infamy each.

name: card.03
title: Glowy green things
rules1: You may also use 1 material from your hand when graverobbing.
rules2: You may use chemicals to tuck under any gadget.

name: card.04
title: Humanoid Cat
rules1: You may also hypnotize 1 card from the deck when hypnotizing.
rules2: Your completed gadgets may horde +1 card each.

name: card.05
title: Vampire-Pepper
rules1: You may draw after playing a wild role.

name: card.06
title: Gravity Engine
rules1: All your minions count as graverobbers.
rules2: When you finish this, you may immediately build or graverob once per infamy.

name: card.07
title: Temporal Clacker
rules1: Before you build, draw a card. you may add two cards to a gadget during the build.
rules2: When you finish a chemical gadget, you may swap it with the top card of the deck.

name: card.08
title: Nefarious Turbine
rules1: You also may hypnotize 1 minion from hand when hypnotizing. x2 max minions.
rules2: Your opponents may not rant during your turn.

name: card.09
title: Birdbath
rules1: Your metal gadgets always function, even when they are unfinished.
rules2: Before you graverob, you may discard the top card of the deck to the graveyard.

name: card.10
title: Abstract Device
rules1: You may hoard an additional card from the deck when you hoard.

name: card.11
title: Ionization Engine
rules1: You may rant after any turn during which you built.
rules2: Each minion you gain may perform its action when you gain it.

name: card.12
title: Baghdad Capacitor
rules1: You may discard all your cards before ranting.
rules2: +2 infamy. you may build this with any single type of material.

name: card.13
title: Antimemetic Weapon
rules1: You may add 1 material from the graveyard to the gadget you are building each time you build.
rules2: You may finish this with no materials.

name: card.14
title: Seven Minute Boots
rules1: When you finish this, you may exchange finished gadgets of the same infamy with an opponent.
rules2: Your minions may perform their actions twice each when you lead or follow their role.

name: card.15
title: AutoCrammer
rules1: Your hoarder minions counts as every role.
rules2: You may give an opponent a card to make one of their completed gadget's functions available to you for one turn.

name: card.16
title: Death Ray
rules1: When hoarding you may hoard 1 extra material from the graveyard.
rules2: When you finish this, the game ends immediately.  score as usual.

name: card.17
title: Kinetic Accumulator
rules1: When the game ends, gain 1 infamy per minion you have.
rules2: You may use one Metal material to finish any gadget.

name: card.18
title: Chronometric Coupler
rules1: You may play multiple cards of the same role in order to perform additional actions.
rules2: If you have one minion of each role, you win.
